title: Normals blind pick Report
body:
Seen as we only have blind picks, can we get a report for people who are fucking retarded and feel the need to take other people's roles please?

2 games today have been like this, one we had 2 ADC's and no jungle, this one we now have 2 supports and no ADC because fuck knows why when both the dumbasses dicking around called ADC and i had already locked a support in.

I'm kind of sick of this shit.

replies.body:
^

pretty much 75% of my games feature people who dont get there roles so they troll or just instalock and flame.
And just so we are clear, i am asking for a report that is taken seriously since you won't give us draft/Lane picking normals.
